glossary.createTip: Click|【Create】|button to create a term library
glossary.createTermTips: Click|【Add Term】|button to create a term
glossary.deleteGlossaryTipTitle: Are you sure to delete the term library?
glossary.deleteGlossaryTipContent: Once the term library is deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
glossary.createTermTip: Click|【Add Term】|or|【Custom Relationship Management】|button to complete the term library
glossary.createCustomRelationTip: Click|【Custom Relationship Management】|button to create custom relationships
glossary.clickTerm: Click on any term on the left to view term information
glossary.deleteTermConfirmTitle: Once deleted, all references to this term will be removed from the term library
glossary.deleteTermOption1: Delete only this term, and the terms under it will be isolated in the term list
glossary.deleteTermOption2: Delete this term and all terms under it
glossary.deleteTermTipsTitle: Are you sure to delete the term?
glossary.deleteTermTipsContent: Once the term is deleted, its references in other terms will also be deleted. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
glossary.deleteCustomRelationTipsContent: Once a custom relationship is deleted, the corresponding relationship in the term will also be deleted. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
glossary.addCustomRelationTips: click the|【Custom Relationship Management】|button to create custom relationships and then proceed with the operation
glossary.addCustomRelationModalTips: Click|【Add】|button to create a custom relationship
glossary.taxonomyIdNotExist: term library id does not exist
glossary.exitTips: After quitting, unsaved content cannot be restored. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
